title: Solar and Wind Overtake Fossil Fuels in the EU
full_text: Solar and Wind Overtake Fossil Fuels in the EU. Wind and solar power overtook fossil fuels last year as a source of electricity in the EU for the first time, a new report found. Semafor adds: The milestone was hit largely thanks to a rise in solar power, which generated a record 13% of electricity in the E…. The milestone was hit largely thanks to a rise in solar power, which generated a record 13% of electricity in the EU, according to Ember. Together, wind and solar hit 30% of EU electricity generation… [+652 chars]
